column2: Do you receive sufficient information on the results of your work?
column3: Does your work give you the opportunity to check on how well you are doing your work?
column4: In your work, do you have access to sufficient data and information?
column5: Do you receive sufficient information on the purpose of your work?
column6: Does your work provide you with direct feedback on how well you are doing your work?
column7: Does your supervisor/line manager inform you about how well you are doing your work?
column8: Do your colleagues inform you about how well you are doing your work?
